effect.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance of burning attacking Pokémon on contact.
effect.full: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being burned. Overworld: If any Pokémon in the party has this ability, each egg in the party has its hatch counter decreased by 2 (rather than 1) each step cycle, making eggs hatch roughly twice as quickly. This effect does not stack if multiple Pokémon have this ability or magma armor.

description.diamond-pearl: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the foe.
